title: Pixel 3 esim activation error
content: I have two pixel 3 phones running on Android version 9. Currently in India. Received 2 esim barcode for both the phones from Airtel. I am able to add carrier from network setting on first phone  but unable to scan esim on second phone . Tried factory reset,enable developer option,install android q beta2. Still no luck. One pixel 3 was purchased from USA and second one from Australia. Both running on Android 9.Same esim manager.
